attribute_definition:
Author defined site description to distinguish between 'stressed' and 'reference' locations as follows. 
                                      Stressed sites were identified by adventitious root growth on A. germinans or L. racemosa trees, standing water at low tide, 
                                      and/or evidence of defoliation. Reference sites had minimal to no adventitious roots, no standing water, and were 60â€“700 m from 
                                      each stressed site.
